title: EnvAttestationPayload
description: Deterministic envelope attestation payload used by Gate R (R6) to bind the trusted runner attestation to the run_id and command_log evidence.

run_id.description: Must match LockedSpec.run_id for the run being verified.

command_log_sha256.description: SHA-256 hex of the command_log artifact bytes this attestation binds to.

signature_alg.description: Signature algorithm for EnvAttestationPayload.signature when present.

signature.description: Base64 signature over canonical_json(EnvAttestationPayload with signature fields removed). Tier policy may require this.
